product_name: Eagle Creek Strictly Business Carry-All Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: With room for a tablet and 17 in. laptop, plus travel-safe features, the women's Eagle Creek Strictly Business Carry-All Shoulder Bag is a superior choice for business trips and weekend getaways. 2 carry options: adjustable, removable 50 in. cross-body shoulder strap and comfortable tote-style handles. Secure-Zip(TM) toggle closure on main compartment deters theft. Passport pocket is hidden inside a zippered pocket. 2 padded, fleece-lined pockets hold a tablet and a 17 in. laptop; additional fleece-lined electronics pocket holds a phone or music player. Internal organization includes slip pockets for electronics, zippered pocket, pen slot and key lanyard. External zippered pockets in front and in back stash items you want kept handy. Dual elasticized slip pockets inside the main compartment organize cords and/or water bottles. Back panel let you slip the bag over the handle of your wheeled luggage. Eagle Creek Convertible Laptop Handbag for women features reflective trim for low-light visibility as well as custom metal hardware and a satin lining.
short_description: With room for a tablet and 17 in. laptop, plus travel-safe features, the women's Eagle Creek Strictly Business Carry-All Shoulder Bag is a superior choice for business trips and weekend getaways.
